title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: A split-rail fence rises from the ground, the wood greyed by age and exposure, but still quite sturdy as it borders the path.  On every other post, brightly flowered wreaths hang, and beneath, wildflowers rise from the earth, as if striving to become a part of the decorations.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
